workshoptitle: Deploying Nextcloud on the Ampere A1 compute in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Create an OCI Arm A1 instance
Deploying Nextcloud on the Ampere A1 Compute
tutorials.description: This workshop guides the user on how to get started with Nextcloud on the OCI Arm A1 compute platform. Nextcloud is a suite of file hosting and collaboration tools, and can be used for collaborative working as well as personal file management and sync in the cloud.
